{
  "article_text": [
    "in @xcite we investigated the theory of _ reticular legendrian unfoldings _ which describes bifurcations of wavefronts on a hypersurface germ with a boundary , a corner , or an @xmath0-corner in a smooth manifold and studied the stabilities and a generic classification of such bifurcations .    in this paper",
    "we give a semi - local classification of bifurcations of wavefronts generated by a hypersurface with an @xmath0-corner .",
    "the wavefronts generated around several points on the initial hypersurface intersect .",
    "for example we consider the below figures in which the initial wavefront with a boundary in a plane and wavefronts generated by the initial wavefront and the boundary to normal directions are described respectively",
    ".     with a boundary and generated wavefronts ( @xmath1 , @xmath2),width=566,height=170 ]    the generated wavefronts bifurcate and typical shapes of bifurcations occur .",
    "the @xmath3 , @xmath4 , and @xmath5 fronts are intersections of fronts generated by different points of the initial wavefront .",
    "the purpose of this paper is the classification of such generic bifurcations of intersections of wavefronts .    as the bifurcation theory of wavefronts",
    "are described by reticular legendrian unfoldings , we shall introduce the notion of _ multi - reticular legendrian unfoldings _ in order to describe the theory of generic bifurcations of intersections of wavefronts generated by different points of a hypersurface with an @xmath0-corner .",
    "the main result of this paper is a classification of generic bifurcations of intersections of wavefronts generated by a hypersurface without boundary or with boundaries in a manifold with dimension @xmath6 and @xmath7 .",
    "the classification list of generating families of generic multi - reticular legendrian unfoldings are given before theorem [ genericclass ] .",
    "we also draw all figures of such bifurcations at the last of this paper .",
    "this paper consists of four sections . in section [",
    "unfold : sec ] we investigate the theory of map germs with respect to _ the reticular @xmath8-@xmath9-@xmath10-equivalence relation _ which plays important roles as generating families of multi - reticular legendrian unfoldings . in section [ retlegunf : sec ] , we review the theory of reticular legendrian unfoldings which is developed in @xcite . in section [ mrlu : sec ]",
    "we introduce the notion of multi - reticular legendrian unfoldings and investigate their equivalence relation , generating families , and stabilities . in section [ generic : sec ]",
    "we reduce our investigation to finitely dimensional jet spaces and give a generic classification of multi - reticular legendrian unfoldings .",
    "in this section we investigate the theory of map germs with respect to _ the reticular @xmath8-@xmath9-@xmath10-equivalence relation _ which is proved by almost parallel methods of @xcite .",

  "abstract_text": [
    "<S> we give a classification of generic bifurcations of intersections of wavefronts generated by different points of a hypersurface with or without boundaries .    </S>",
    "<S> [ section ] [ tth]definition [ tth]lemma [ tth]proposition      + takaharu tsukada + college of humanities & sciences , department of mathematics , + nihon university </S>"
